Gulp SVG Sprites (1 icons in <symbol> mode)

Files Generated:

  1. content/symbols.svg

Usage:

  1. Include the contents of the SVG file just after the opening <body> tag.
  2. Paste one of the snippets anywhere into your website.

  • icon-cross


    <svg class="c-svg-icon icon-cross"><use xlink:href="#icon-cross"></use></svg>
